title: Choosing Submission
description: The player decides to submit to the Spiral Gang's rules and agrees to Royce's demands, hoping to minimize conflict.
dialogue: The unease in the room dissipates slightly as you nod, 'Alright, I'll follow your rules. Just let me get the robot.' Royce's grin widens, and Dum Dum's posture relaxes a fraction, sensing an easy victory.

npc_reactions.Royce: Royce exudes satisfaction, relishing the feeling of dominance as he prepares to finalize the deal.
npc_reactions.Dum Dum: Dum Dum seems pleased, his body language shifts from aggression to amusement.

Royce.goal: Indicate that the player needs to pay an extra sum of money to buy the robot
Establish a friendly relationship with the player

Royce.trigger_condition: The player shows submission to the gang rules
Royce.goal: Increase trust and bargaining power with the player

Dum Dum.goal: Intimidate the player, making them accept their rules
Introduce the player to his boss, Royce

player_options: Try to negotiate for trade instead of cash
environment: The dimly lit room feels slightly less oppressive as you show willingness to comply, the atmosphere tinged with tension but also an air of negotiation.

interactive_npc.name: Royce
interactive_npc.goal: Sell the robot at a high price and extort money from the player

emotion_pool.goal: Indicate that the player needs to pay an extra sum of money to buy the robot

emotion_pool.trigger_condition: The player shows submission to the gang rules

key_questions.content: What means will the player use to obtain the robot?
What is the player's attitude toward these two NPCs and the Spiral Gang?
Does the player follow the rules of the Spiral Gang?
What are the potential consequences if the player disobeys the Spiral Gang's rules?

title: Defiant Stand
description: The player defiantly refuses to comply with the rules of the Spiral Gang, igniting potential conflict.
dialogue: You straightened up, a glare directed at Royce. 'I wonâ€™t be pushed around by you or your gang. Make your move.' Tension crackled in the air, and Dum Dum smirked, ready to unleash his intimidation.

npc_reactions.Royce: Royce seethes with fury, his hand instinctively reaching for his weapon, eyes alight with menace.
npc_reactions.Dum Dum: Dum Dum's expression shifts from amusement to a predatory grin, enjoying the prospect of violence.

Royce.trigger_condition: The player mentions having already paid money to the previous boss
Royce.goal: Refuse to refund, threaten the player, and apply pressure

Royce.trigger_condition: The player clearly states they will not pay extra money

Dum Dum.trigger_condition: The player refuses to accept Dum Dum's gang rules

Dum Dum.goal: Further escalate the threat over player compliance

player_options: Try to talk your way out
environment: The tension in the room thickens, shadows creeping into the corners as you stand defiant, knowing full well the risks you take.
